snippet.title: Lionel Messi rescues Barcelona's Spanish title hopes
snippet.description:
* It was far from vintage Barcelona, but it was enough to keep alive the Catalan club's dwindling hopes of retaining the Spanish league title.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/20/sport/football/messi-barcelona-spain-football/index.html

snippet.title: Gareth Bale brilliance settles Copa del Rey final
snippet.description:
* It may have cost a reported $134 million to bring Gareth Bale to Spain, but on Wednesday he scored a priceless goal as Real Madrid beat archrivals Barcelona 2-1 to win the Copa del Rey.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/16/sport/football/barcelona-real-madrid-copa-del-rey-football/index.html

snippet.title: Champions League: Barcelona dumped out by Atletico, Bayern beats Man U
snippet.description:
* Every year there is talk of how the Champions League trophy will find itself lured back to Madrid for "La Decima" -- or the tenth as Real Madrid refers to it.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/09/sport/football/football-bayern-munich-manchester-united/index.html

snippet.title: Atletico left frustrated as Chelsea battle to scoreless draw in Vicente Calderon
snippet.description:
* Jose Mourinho's Chelsea exerted a tactical stranglehold on hosts Atletico Madrid to earn a goalless draw in the first leg of their Champions League semifinal Tuesday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/22/sport/football/chelsea-atletico-madrid-football/index.html

snippet.title: Barcelona's week goes from bad to worse with league loss
snippet.description:
* Barcelona's week went from bad to worse Saturday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/12/sport/football/barcelona-granada-bayern-football/index.html

snippet.title: Lionel Messi inspires Barcelona to 4-3 win over Real Madrid in El Clasico
snippet.description:
* Barcelona manager Gerardo Martino said prior to Sunday's El Clasico that it was his team's last chance in the Spanish title race.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/23/sport/football/real-madrid-barcelona-clasico/index.html

snippet.title: Real Madrid sunk by Sevilla as Atletico and Barcelona triumph
snippet.description:
* The three-way battle for the Spanish league title took another dramatic twist on Wednesday night as Real Madrid suffered their second defeat in four days.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/26/sport/football/football-real-madrid-barcelona/index.html

snippet.title: Manchester United hold Bayern Munich as Atletico Madrid draw in Barcelona
snippet.description:
* It was honors even when the opening legs of this year's Champions League quarterfinals took place on Tuesday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/01/sport/football/champions-league-manchester-united-bayern-munich/index.html

snippet.title: Barcelona maintains momentum but Bayern Munich finally drops points
snippet.description:
* The Spanish title race might have taken another twist Saturday when Barcelona visited mid-table Espanyol in the Catalan derby. For more than 75 minutes, the home team blanked Lionel Messi and the rest of the Barcelona attack.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/29/sport/football/barcelona-espanyol-bayern-football/index.html

snippet.title: Revenge for Real Madrid in Champions League as Chelsea slump continues
snippet.description:
* With an awesome four-goal display from striker Robert Lewandowski in the first leg of their semifinal last year, Borussia Dortmund all but knocked Real Madrid out of the Champions League.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/02/sport/football/champions-league-real-madrid-dortmund/index.html
